title: LFM Ranked 5's Team Gold 5 +
body:
Hey All,

Need 2 players to round out our roster for a Ranked 5s team. We want to win/climb ofc but nothing super serious.

Looking for a Jungler and then either a Top Laner or a Mid.

Team is ranked silver but current players are Gold 4, Plat 5 and Plat 5.

Feel free to post here, we are playing tonight around 7pm EST. Best way to get hold of me would be to just add Bados in game.

replies.body:
G'day.
I main mid.
My champion pool is pretty big, but the champs I'm really comfortable on are: Leblanc, Xerath, Syndra, Zed.

Currently G4, but honestly, the SoloQ cancer is holding me back =].

Seethingsin is my ign

D5 mid lane main

add me =)
I'm happy to help you guys out? I can fill either but have a small mid pool, so I'd probs top, hmu if you need a hand!
